name: Meteor Breaker (LowResJam 2016)
description:
Break as many meteors as you can before you run out of fuel!

  • ARROWS: move
  • SPACE: hyperspace (break meteors)
  • Hyperspace consumes fuel
  • x5 combo to enter MAX mode
  • In MAX mode your fuel doesn't drop

A game made in 3 days for LowResJam 2016: https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam2016

The goal was to create a game using a 64*64 grid. My entry is not entirely correct as there are some rotations, but I'm pretty satisfied with the result in regard of the time I spend on it!

Just a little issue to make my pixel webfont work on itch.io.. resulting in a round pixel for the game over screen :/

All made with Construct 2, and Ableton Live for the musics.
